Текст о компании: Engineering and Production Enterprise «New Technologies» LLC has been operating since 2005 and is one of the leading manufacturers of technological equipment in a block-modular design for the development of oil and gas fields and components for them, specializing in the provision of services for well dewaxing and major repairs of equipment in the regions of the Far North (Krasnoyarsk and Perm Territories, Irkutsk and Tyumen Regions, etc.).
Текст о продукции: The quality of products provided by «New Technologies» Engineering and Production Enterprise  LLC complies with all safety and quality standards, confirmed by the relevant Russian and Eurasian Economic Union (EAEU) certificates. The company has certificates of conformity to the international standards, quality management systems, environmental management systems and occupational health and safety management systems: ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2016, ISO 45001-2018, ISO 29001:2020.
Текст о сервисных услугах: Besides equipment manufacturing, «New Technologies» Engineering and Production Enterprise LLC also specializes on well dewaxing and repairing services, maintenance of automation equipment for oil production and treatment.
